FuncDef:
The pos-trunk command adds a POS interface to a POS-Trunk interface.
The undo pos-trunk command deletes a POS interface from a POS-Trunk interface.
By default, no POS interfaces are added to a POS-Trunk interface.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of a POS-Trunk interface.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 127.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To add a POS interface to a POS-Trunk interface, run the pos-trunk command.
Prerequisites
A POS-Trunk interface has been created using the interface pos-trunk command.
APS has been created on the POS interface to be added to a POS-Trunk interface. Otherwise, services on the POS-Trunk interface may be interrupted.
The link layer protocol of the POS interface has been configured as PPP.
Precautions
In APS and PW association mode, if a working POS interface leaves the POS-Trunk interface, traffic is interrupted.
Only physical attribute-related configurations, such as APS, shutdown, undo shutdown, and description, can exist on a POS interface.
